resources.string: Tell your partner what you need
How do I connect to my partner?
Input your partner\'s token (which they can send you via another app) into the partner\'s token field.
How do I add the widget to my home screen?
Long press on your home screen and click on "Widgets". Find Love Letter in the widget list and drag it onto your home screen. You can resize it as you like.
